34970.扉は かたく 閉ざされている。: The door is locked up tight

34971.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「かつて この館は\:
This mansion used to be a villa for King Megistris and his family. The late queen was from Orphea. She had a mysterious power that
caused her death at a very young age. She died leaving behind a young prince. It is a very sad thing, isn't it?

34972.扉は かたく 閉ざされている。: The door is locked up tight

34973.「おぬしら ２階で何やっとったんじゃ？\n なんだか 館が不思議な光に包まれたよ:
What were you doing upstairs? I had a strange feeling that the mansion was enveloped in a mysterious light. Hmm? You have to go see
Prince Raguas at Megistris Castle? I don't know what's going on, but I'm in a hurry.
